name: The Last Tower (itch) (hermdog)
description:
The Ogres are coming! 

You are assigned to the last cannon tower in the realm to resist the invasion as long as possible. How many waves of Ogres can you handle?

This is a one-button tower defense game:

Click on the roof (or press space) to rotate the cannons and release to fire.

Credits:

Some sound fx from Zapsplat.com

Music by Darren Curtis

Warlock's Gauntlet artists - rAum, jackFlower, DrZoliparia, Neil2D
Most Dall-E
